comment.text: This translation key is used to display a notification title indicating useful tips for a specific product. It appears in a toast notification component, providing users with a hint about relevant information or features available for them.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Useful {{productName}} tips' implies a more concise and engaging title. The Arabic translation 'نصائح مفيدة حول {{productName}}' translates literally to 'Useful tips about {{productName}}' which is somewhat clunky. A more natural and engaging translation would convey the 'tips for' aspect more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'نصائح {{productName}} المفيدة' (Useful {{productName}} tips) or 'نصائح هامة لـ {{productName}}' (Important tips for {{productName}})

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Useful {{productName}} tips' implies helpful advice or guidance. The Japanese translation '{{productName}}の使い方やヒント' translates more to 'How to use {{productName}} and hints'. It doesn't convey the 'useful' aspect as strongly. A more accurate translation that captures the 'useful' aspect could be '{{productName}}をより便利に使うヒント' ({{productName}} helpful usage tips) or '{{productName}}を最大限に活用するためのヒント' (Hints to maximize the use of {{productName}}).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '{{productName}}をより便利に使うヒント' or '{{productName}}を最大限に活用するためのヒント' for a more accurate translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Dicas úteis para o {{productName}}" is not a perfect equivalent. A more natural translation would be "Dicas úteis sobre o {{productName}}" or "Dicas úteis do {{productName}}".  'Para o' implies 'for' which isn't the best fit here.

The translation 'Các mẹo hữu ích sử dụng {{productName}}' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese. 'Sử dụng' (use) is redundant. A better translation would focus on the helpfulness of the tips for the product.
